frontmatter.title: Smart Arcade Controller (Python / Raspberry Pi Zero W)
frontmatter.description: An arcade controller that tracks players input data in real time, provides user statistics and helps the user learn button and directional combinations for specific games.

frontmatter.title: snkrDB (C# / .NET Core / React)
frontmatter.description: A basic sneaker web application that aims to help give users outfit ideas for their sneakers as well as help them decide on future purchases.
